text: I had the pleasure of being served by the barista, and it was an absolute delight. Not only was he incredibly friendly, but he also possessed a deep knowledge of coffee. The espresso well crafted with flavourful experience. Well, just give it a try!

I recently visited Tanamera Coffee Indonesia and tried their Matcha Latte with soy milk, and I must say, it was a delightful experience! The matcha latte had a light, subtle flavor, but it was perfectly balanced and incredibly satisfying. I loved how it wasn't overly sweet. It’s definitely one of the best matcha lattes I’ve had in a while!

What made my visit even more enjoyable was the amazing staff. He was warm, welcoming, and attentive, ensuring that everything was just right. His friendly demeanor truly elevated the overall experience.

Tanamera Coffee is definitely a place I’d recommend for both a great drink and exceptional service. Can’t wait to visit again!

Good and strong coffee. Initially wanted with sugar but the coffee blend is sweet enough that you can drink it without sugar. This was of course recommended by the barista who was friendly and gave advice to get my proper coffee fixed!
Brand new coffee spot for office workers here! Love the service by Barista Muzz & the iced coffee was great too! Shall drop by again for my coffee fix.
Good to have an aromatic coffee here. The service person is cool and cheerful guy who always welcomes with great smile and provides good service ..!
